553790.name: Once in Yaissor
553790.description:
Game Features:

- Complex plot

- Well-developed characters

- Great humor

- Unique style

- Life themes are touched upon

- No annoying anime characters

Summer, 2020, Ya'issor. Most people have become youtubers, streamers, and other scum, and almost no one wants to be a working bum. Nobody has an opinion of their own. Everyone thinks they are nihilists, atheists, reading intellectuals and other elites. But life has not changed, because all the people who are persecuted are the same as they are. That is why Yaissor is no longer Europe-Asia, it is now Atheist-Bull. Atheisto is led by the people themselves, or rather by those who engage in Internet activity. At the head of the Bildo is Nitup and it is this part of the country that supplies Yaissor with all the production it needs, because in Atheisto live people who believe that work is for people who are backward in development.

RECENTS

Over and over again.. - It is not interesting to walk alone, however, in the company of friends and a few boxes of spirits, this story can be very funny!

Heart of the Games - I don't understand even single word but it's best game I have ever seen.

StopGame.ru - Passing Yaissor alone is not interesting, but in the company of friends and a few cases of strong drinks this novel can be very funny :-)

BF Reviews - An excellent novel with a deep story from domestic developers. Real photos, real life situations, well readable text. Funny and sometimes sad.

highlighted.name: Ну почему жестока так порой любовь...
